Message:
The experiment was a failure,
leaving a lone student
on her knees in tears.
The sight stole my breath away.

I mean, I just didn’t get
her feelings in the slightest.

Living without a purpose
like I have, I’ve never
seriously cried or rejoiced
over anything before.

Just how frustrated would
you have to be to sob in a pile
on the floor like that?
Just how fun would that feel...?

So, when I asked the girl
in question exactly that,
she laid on quite the bruisin’...

But, thanks to that, it was like
my eyes’d finally opened.

A life without failure is just
a life without challengin’ yourself.

Maybe if I started takin’
somethin’ seriously now,
things’d get a little more fun...

I always thought I’d be fine
just dyin’ whenever.
Wanting to live now is
like some sick joke...
